name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: fs.trash.checkpoint.interval
description:
Number of minutes between trash checkpoints.
  Should be smaller or equal to fs.trash.interval. If zero,
  the value is set to the value of fs.trash.interval.
  Every time the checkpointer runs it creates a new checkpoint
  out of current and removes checkpoints created more than
  fs.trash.interval minutes ago.

name: mapreduce.job.speculative.minimum-allowed-tasks
description:
The minimum allowed tasks that
  can be speculatively re-executed at any time.

name: dfs.namenode.reconstruction.pending.timeout-sec
description:
Timeout in seconds for block reconstruction.  If this value is 0 or less,
    then it will default to 5 minutes.

name: ipc.client.connect.max.retries.on.timeouts
description:
Indicates the number of retries a client will make on socket timeout
               to establish a server connection.
